languages.text: {n}Мучительная близость Эмпиреев тысячами игл вонзается в {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}вашу затронутую колдовством душу{/d} — Саргона не блефует, он и прямь готов обречь всех на страшную участь.{/n}

{n}Like a thousand needles, the painful proximity of the Empyrean pierces {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}your sorcery-touched soul{/d}, and you realise that Sargona is not bluffing — he really is willing to condemn everyone here to a terrible fate.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мучительная близость Эмпиреев тысячами игл вонзается в {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}вашу затронутую колдовством душу{/d} — Саргона не блефует, он и прямь готов обречь всех на страшную участь.{/n}

languages.text: {n}舰船离亚空间已经很近了，至高天的影响仿佛一千根针刺穿了你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}被巫术触碰过的灵魂{/d}。你意识到，萨戈纳并不是在虚张声势，他真的打算把船上的人全都拖下水，让所有人都面临比死亡更可怕的命运。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Like a thousand needles, the painful proximity of the Empyrean pierces {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}your sorcery-touched soul{/d}, and you realise that Sargona is not bluffing — he really is willing to condemn everyone here to a terrible fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}舰船离亚空间已经很近了，至高天的影响仿佛一千根针刺穿了你{/d}被巫术触碰过的灵魂{/n}。你意识到，萨戈纳并不是在虚张声势，他真的打算把船上的人全都拖下水，让所有人都面临比死亡更可怕的命运。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}

languages.text: {n}千本の針のように、エンピリアンの痛ましい気配が{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}あなたの魔術に触れられた魂{/d}を貫き、あなたはサルゴナがはったりをかましているのではないことを悟る。彼は本当にここにいる全員を恐ろしい運命へと突き落とす気だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Like a thousand needles, the painful proximity of the Empyrean pierces {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}your sorcery-touched soul{/d}, and you realise that Sargona is not bluffing — he really is willing to condemn everyone here to a terrible fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}千本の針のように、エンピリアンの痛ましい気配が{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}あなたの魔術に触れられた魂{/d}を貫き、あなたはサルゴナがはったりをかましているのではないことを悟る。彼は本当にここにいる全員を恐ろしい運命へと突き落とす気だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Como un millar de agujas, la dolorosa proximidad del Empíreo atraviesa {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}tu alma tocada por la hechicería{/d}, y comprendes que Sargona no miente: está realmente dispuesto a condenar a todos los presentes a un destino espantoso.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Like a thousand needles, the painful proximity of the Empyrean pierces {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}your sorcery-touched soul{/d}, and you realise that Sargona is not bluffing — he really is willing to condemn everyone here to a terrible fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Como un millar de agujas, la dolorosa proximidad del Empíreo atraviesa {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}tu alma tocada por la hechicería{/d}, y comprendes que Sargona no miente: está realmente dispuesto a condenar a todos los presentes a un destino espantoso.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Wie tausend Nadeln durchdringt die schmerzhafte Nähe des Empyreums {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}deine durch Zauberei beeinflusste Seele{/d}, und du erkennst, dass Sargona nicht blufft – er ist wirklich bereit, alle hier zu einem furchtbaren Schicksal zu verdammen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Like a thousand needles, the painful proximity of the Empyrean pierces {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}your sorcery-touched soul{/d}, and you realise that Sargona is not bluffing — he really is willing to condemn everyone here to a terrible fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Wie tausend Nadeln durchdringt die schmerzhafte Nähe des Empyreums {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}deine durch Zauberei beeinflusste Seele{/d}, und du erkennst, dass Sargona nicht blufft – er ist wirklich bereit, alle hier zu einem furchtbaren Schicksal zu verdammen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gök Diyar'ın acı verici yakınlığı, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}büyüyle kutsanmış ruhunu{/d} binlerce iğne gibi delip geçiyor. Sargona'nın blöf yapmadığını fark ediyorsun. Kendisi gerçekten de buradaki herkesi dehşet verici bir kadere sürüklemeye hazır.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Like a thousand needles, the painful proximity of the Empyrean pierces {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}your sorcery-touched soul{/d}, and you realise that Sargona is not bluffing — he really is willing to condemn everyone here to a terrible fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gök Diyar'ın acı verici yakınlığı, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}büyüyle kutsanmış ruhunu{/d} binlerce iğne gibi delip geçer ve Sargona'nın blöf yapmadığını fark edersin. Kendisi gerçekten de buradaki herkesi dehşet verici bir kadere sürüklemeye hazırdır.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La proximité de l'Empyréen perce votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}âme touchée par la sorcellerie{/d} comme mille aiguilles. Vous comprenez alors que Sargona ne plaisante pas. Il est prêt à tous les condamner à un sombre destin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Like a thousand needles, the painful proximity of the Empyrean pierces {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}your sorcery-touched soul{/d}, and you realise that Sargona is not bluffing — he really is willing to condemn everyone here to a terrible fate.{/n}
